lender.name: Peg
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe it is the first step in empowering those who want to help themselves. I feel it will only pay forward, from me, to them, to others.
lender.occupational_info: I have 40 years of nursing, in a hospital in ICU, dialysis and general surgery.

lender.name: Dane
lender.loan_because: I loan because it feels good to make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that promotes life at the neighborhood level. We love community, and helping people of quality to buy and sell homes of quality.

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help. I have great respect for the people who take up the loans and in all the years I loan I have seen all my loans being paid back!
lender.occupational_info: I am giving support to companies to operate in a more sustainable way, it is for me the best way I can help the people and the planet. Customers realize often that being more sustainable is also better for business and their employees!

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I have lived in many countries and seen the difference between the have and have nots.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students who play sports.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: To help
lender.occupational_info: LOL.. useless. I help sell more products that we don't need

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to have a family full of unconditional love and support and I want to share that encouragement and hope with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with photographers and designers to create catalogs and advertisements used to sell ladies handbags and accessories.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: A search for the truth and an unbiased reporting of the events in my community on a daily bases.

lender.name: Digger the Cat
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pat's Grandchildren
lender.loan_because: We want help people who arn't as fortunate as our family.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: There are so many reasons to participate in this program. Just a couple would be that its a way to connect to people around the world and a way to lend a little support to someone who is trying to make their world a little better.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and want to see how well it works
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Eliza T.
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving people a leg up is often the precipitant to a life-long reverberation of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing to college students.

lender.name: Randal
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to invest $25!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's a double purpose: it helps promote good progress thru enterprise and it makes me feel good. What better deal is out there?
lender.occupational_info: I work on improving how giving "practice" is implemented in the United States.

lender.name: Amrahs Keviv
lender.loan_because: it's an investment in potential

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Beni
lender.loan_because: Moooo!
lender.occupational_info: That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I've dreamed of one day being a philanthropist when I "became wealthy." I recently realized by much of the world's standards, I've been wealthy for years. It's now time to stop dreaming and start giving. Thanks to Kiva.org my family and I can do so.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are co-founders of Life On Purpose Institute, inc. Since 1996 we've assisted people to clarify their life purpose then design their life to be a reflection of that purpose. We also training Life On Purpose Coaches to do the same.

lender.name: Posh Baby
lender.loan_because: I want to support other the way I have been supported.
lender.occupational_info: POSH is a lifestyle boutique offering modern, eco-friendly and stylish products for child and home. We offer the best baby and children's clothing, toys, modern furniture, gear & gifts for the modern family including maternity essentials + accessories.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Each and every one of us, in some way, big or small, can make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students how to speak French.

lender.name: Raya+Shai
lender.loan_because: we can, and because we care! kiva makes it easy for us to take part in fulfilling someone's dream and we're grateful for the opportunity
lender.occupational_info: i'm a self employed massage therapist, providing therapeutic bodywork to people in need and natural facelift massages for those looking to improve their looks in a natural way.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: this site is fascinating to me!
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can to change the world $1 and 1 decision at a time. This applies to my school, my work, my home life.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a change

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have had good fortune, and others need my help.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupation: Group Manager for a software company

lender.name: Catheryn
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to live in a country where we have social welfare programs for people not as well off as myself. I love that these people are willing to work hard to improve their situations in life.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked off and on while raising my 3 sons and am lucky enough now to be able to stay home and enjoy life.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Love is the primal energy of the universe, and loaning money to those in need is a tangible way to manifest this love.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am more fortunate than others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical devices to surgeons.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have what I have...a sense of security for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am the primary caregiver for my family. I also keep current in my occupation as a RN.

lender.name: Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: how can I not? This is a simply brilliant way for many individuals to make a collective difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to improve their health and wellbeing.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky to live in a country where loans are available and I love the idea that I can help others create their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I practice medicine by diagnosing and treating patients in emergency medicine

lender.name: Cass
lender.loan_because: I feel it's a great way to help to business, families and lifes grow in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: homework, studying and more homework!

lender.name: Irene
lender.occupational_info: I own a shop for horse riding products.

lender.name: Attila
lender.loan_because: I feel that helping small business will empower those people and make it less likely for them to be exploited.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Mechanical Engineer at a company that manufactures waterslides for locations around the world. My main responsibilities include part design and quality control.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with a wonderful life due to the luck of the draw at my birth. There are so many others in this world that weren't so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government. I study the health of my local bays.

lender.name: Tom & Kathy
lender.loan_because: other people can be helped
lender.occupational_info: trying to help others when we can

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: Most people here in the U.S. live better than kings dreamed about living. Why not take a little every month and help people help themselves with their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in an emergency and I am fortunate to make a living at it.

lender.name: MAKAI PRODUCTIONS
lender.loan_because: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others. ~Plato

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing opportunity. Its the right thing to do. Plus, I enjoy seeing other people fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: As a restoration contractor, I make old things look new again.

lender.name: King of Floppy Hats, EC
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Peter & Sara
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to 'ensure a person has the tools they need to catch their own fish' rather than just giving them the fish.
lender.occupational_info:
Peter is a high school counselor. He helps students realize that the future is imminent, and that they need to take action. He helps them choose classes that complement their goals.
Sara is a college student. She is getting a degree in Molecular Bioscience & Biotechnology, and plans to attend graduate school.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: People helped me when I needed it. Now, I am in the position to help others.

lender.name: Anderson
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lesly
lender.loan_because: I can! I want my children to see that a small gesture can make a big difference, that believing in something can make it happen, and that if we all do our part, we can make the world a better place.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: Sharing the wealth
lender.occupational_info: Finding out what needs to be done, when, and by whom. Then keeping them organized to finish the job!

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans are the greatest means of empowerment in a global economy.
lender.occupational_info: My life work focuses on social activism in the areas of health, housing and global citizenship.

lender.name: Presti Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a shot at being their own boss.

lender.name: Stanfield
lender.loan_because: I beleive if you can conceive, then you will acheive to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I support dreams,visions into reality promoting life!

lender.name: Joe and Nancy
lender.loan_because: we're grateful for what we have.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell their homes

lender.name: Mattie
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical drugs that save lives of people who are ill. I sell directly to hospitals.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am able to do it, even though I am not wealthy; my life is full; it allows me to connect with people all over the world; it feels good; all of my teachers taught me giving is a gift and it is!
lender.occupational_info: As a biologist, I work to understand the factors contributing to the decline of species. Then, I mechanically remove impediments and rebuild and restore habitats to allow threatened and endangered species to, at the very least, survive another day.

lender.name: Sotiros (Sid)
lender.loan_because: It's God's Holy Will

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: Initiative is something that should be given an opportunity, regardless of where you are born.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in high school with a variety of interest. I enjoy business, politics, music, and sports.

lender.name: Ardeane
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand now and then.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with health, a beautiful smart healthy daughter, and a good life. I feel it is my obligation to help others that are in need and that are trying to better themselves and their families. Thank you Kivi for giving all these wonderful inspiring people to us, so we can share in their future and share all this good will and love. Because that is what all "this is" about...love

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: because I care.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I like the feeling of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as a nurse in Public Health for 25 years. I am now retired and raise puppies for Southeastern Guide Dogs, Inc. I also have a therapy dog that assists in physical therapy and works with special needs children.

lender.name: Colin & Sarah
lender.loan_because: loans helped us through college and allowed for our successful and happy lives
lender.occupational_info: We sell medicines to sick people.

lender.name: Karen & Tina
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help children understand the importance of giving to others....
lender.occupational_info: we work with children who are deaf and hard of hearing

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me, so that I may bless others.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I understand an entrepreneur's need for a small loan to make a big difference in their business.

lender.name: Bob & Mary
lender.loan_because: We celebrated our 50th wedding anniversary (2007) this year. We want others to share in our good fortune!

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: A donation to Kiva is the gift that keeps on giving. How cool is that?!
lender.occupational_info: I write a column with all sorts of information. (Recipes, crafts, stories, photos, etc.) Check it out & subscribe for free!

lender.name: Mike V. Christensen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We supply gasoline ,dieselfuel and propane tocompanies and indivials

lender.name: JET
lender.loan_because: For my sister Janett Elaine Talkington.She passed away on May 18,2007.I started jet outreach for her.She was my mother,sister,friend.Jan will always be missed.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.whereabouts: Surry Hills NSW New South Wales

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to make my living in agriculture in the US. If my small loan can help someone else be successful in agriculture, the world is a slightly smaller, slightly better place.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write books that inspire, motivate, and help change the way people think about themselves and the world.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people out

lender.name: Ed and Donna
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are able to do so. My family is fortunate to be able to afford assisting others. There is SUCH a need. We hope that our small loans can combine with others given worldwide to truly make a difference in other's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Last summer I retired from my job a a purchasing agent in Oregon. I now enjoy volunteering, travel and having more time at home. I hope my retirement will enable me to make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to share my many blessings.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have raised 7 children. We have 5 sons and 2 daughters. We have 5 grandchildren.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: This is the best way I can help reduce poverty in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a proud gamer.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: This is in memory of my mother who was my best friend and always supported me and was there to help me out when it was needed. She had a big heart and cared about everyone and this is why I am the person I am today.
lender.occupational_info: The best job to have is to be able to help others regardless of what the income. It is the smile on someone else's face and happiness that matters.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is a way my wife and I can make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I work with students that have learning disabilities, difficulties with reading and / or writing.

lender.name: Jeramie
lender.loan_because:
Everyone should have an opportunity to become what they are willing to work for.
Save The Humans!
lender.occupational_info: Computer guy.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: it combines philanthropy with online shopping. What could be better?! :)
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate programming and curricula for adolescents, in areas like substance use and sexual health.

lender.name: Lynsky Family Kids
lender.loan_because: I want my kids to understand that they (ages, 9,6, 4, 2) can have a positive impact on others lives. Two of my kids gave every bit of money they had saved to help Vilma.
lender.occupational_info: rasing great kids that will help benefit the world!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: How can I not loan when I have been blessed with so much and Kiva makes it so easy to help others?
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can! I love to see people prosper and better themselvese.
lender.occupational_info: I am actively raising 3 young children.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I believe that the fate of women in developing countries lies primarily in the opportunity to be financially independent.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am living my dream of studying birds in a beautiful environment (and getting paid to do it). By providing Kiva loans, I hope I can help others pursue their dreams and to find the kind of fulfillment I currently enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and conduct research and monitoring projects on Sonoran desert birds. I manage several projects that cover a large area, for which collaboration with my ever-expanding network of friends and collaborators is often necessary and is always appreciated. Also, I participate in several partnerships and working groups whose goal is to improve our understanding of and address issues related to the distribution and population trends of birds in the U.S. and Mexico.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: i think this is fun

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I can. Everyone needs assistance at some point and it is a priviledge to be able to offer it.
lender.occupational_info: Management Consultant

lender.name: The McIntyres
lender.loan_because: we are able!

lender.name: Baxter
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Lisa & John
lender.loan_because: we want to give back and be an example to our children.

lender.name: Sage
lender.loan_because: I Can
lender.occupational_info: I work as a website optimizer.

lender.name: bagus
lender.loan_because: Our traditional music group need home.
lender.occupational_info: We learn tradisional music and dance for performance.

lender.name: winston
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: dangerous and rewarding

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: When you think that you have it so bad, turn around and look.Â There is always someone worse off.Â Why not help?Â Even if it's only a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Code Enforcement Officer for the Police Department.Â Part of the job is animal control and the other part is a zoning inspector.Â I deal with illegal dwellings, graffiti, illegal dumping etc.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I find that money is an asset that can be easily shared and its better to give than recieve.
lender.occupational_info: I am internet marketing professional. I am also a venture capitalist. I find the best investment and go for it.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe that, if you are able, you should do what you can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in education for 18 years. I have done everything from teacher to a high school principal (called director or headmaster in some countries)

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to have good personal finances.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I should. We all should!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer, researcher, and teacher.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I go to Elementary school and im 12 years old.

lender.name: lis
lender.loan_because: I have been helped many times in my life and would like to continue the circle.
lender.occupational_info: I make videos about the lives of seniors for their families.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to support other women business owners - especially working mothers like myself.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help other people have better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are sick in the hospital.

lender.name: Wickman Kiva Kids
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are 6th grade students who want to make a difference in this world, and we want to get the word out that kids our age can have a real impact even around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are the entire 6th grade, boys and girls, ages 10 â 12, spread out over five classes at Wickman Elementary School. We total about 135 kids and five teachers. We are enthusiastic about getting involved!

lender.name: Juliet
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people on the small budget that I have right now.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to help themselves.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: it supports sustainable development and aids struggling, hard-working entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Sales and Distribution of architectural products and contract furniture

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: Presenf from my dad

lender.name: Sheilah
lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to know they are cared for by others.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: There is nothing in this world that can't be done. With the help that I will provide I will make miracles happen.
lender.occupational_info: Very demanding and full of surprises.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: This concept seems pretty amazingly cool.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the technical aspects of putting news on television.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Stian
lender.occupational_info: Shipping and environment

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the basics in life and a chance to live a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Senior Portfolio Manager in London.

lender.name: Jim & Katie
lender.loan_because: We both understand the need for funds when starting a new business from personal experience. The self-sufficiency of owning your own business is empowering and a positive asset for yourself and your local economy.
lender.occupational_info: We are now retired, but have both owned retail stores. Jim had manufacturing businesses, taught university business classes and most recently was President of JanSport, Eastpak, Kipling International.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: In simple terms, it helps people, itâs easy, fun and it makes me smile. How often can one say that?
lender.occupational_info: own a small business and am a communications advisor.

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people like my mother who worked hard at home to give us more than she ever had...
lender.occupational_info: Retired teacher/lecturer. Carer to my wife (now deceased r.i.p.) who had Alzheimers

lender.name: Cecilia Valdez-Fernandez
lender.loan_because: With such a small amount we can make a huge difference in someone' life.

lender.name: melissa & her 3 kids
lender.loan_because: My family is in business and we needed loans from traditional sources to start out, so passing it onward to others who are trying to help themselves is exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies looking to hire professionals and I find professionals looking for new jobs. Then I introduce them to each other.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: microfinancing is something I believe in. People who want to improve their lives want to do so with dignity and integrity, and KIVA is a way to achieve that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work in foreign policy, and believe that microfinancing is a better tool of diplomacy than a multi-million dollar loan because it's a people to people connection.

lender.name: Seeding a dream
lender.loan_because: We want our combined families to have the opportunity of sharing in this project. They have been 'givers' all their lives and seeded many dreams within our families.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help and everyone needs someone to believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in an elementary school in South Korea.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: a small wave can join with a larger wave that washes the world with hope.

lender.name: Keven
lender.loan_because: It is important to try to do something positive, wherever you are.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a school in South Korea.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Life is not a rehearsal.
lender.occupational_info: I help students find and get scholarships for university.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams and goals in life.

lender.name: KrazyLadies
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Our work includes supporting our families -- children, husbands, grandchildren, greatgrandchildren, and more. Our work is to nurture, support and empower each other, ourselves, and those whose paths cross with ours.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.occupation: DoD Secretary, Department of the Army
lender.loan_because: I know what's its like to having a dream and not knowing how to accomplish it without the monetary resources needed. Thru Kiva we can lend a helping hand to people who are not willing to just setting for nothing. People have dreams and if we can help make their dream come true then its all worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: My work is based on helping the hospital's pathology department. My main responsibility is to make sure more than 100 employees get pay according to the time they put in and the time they took off. I do payroll. Love my job because I work with doctors and Soldiers. I also type memos, awards, certificates, recommendations, and may other clerical work. Maintenance credential documents too. Love it!

lender.name: Kristiaan
lender.loan_because: the money I supply for loans can hopefully make a big difference in their lifes. (and a small one in mine ;-)

lender.name: Alastair
lender.loan_because: I want to make a meaningful and life changing contribution to the world we live in. In conjunction with my involvement with a New York based charity called Orphans International, this will enable me to continue helping people in the developing world improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Mergers & Acquisitions for an International Boutique Investment Bank, facilitating cross border transactions between North America and Europe.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I can't believe how much good I can do with a small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing at a community college.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: In my travels I have been amazed at the resilience of the human spirit in the face of adversity. I believe that, with these loans, I can make a difference in promoting peace, justice, and understanding around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Active volunteer, Reiki Master, gardener, sailor, world traveler.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I am a single mother and am building my own business to support my family. I want to help others in whatever way I can to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I use broken, thrown away clear and colored glass to make colorful windows and lamps.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes perfect economic sense: providing capital so that people can work on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I study, play rugby, read, and play several instruments.

lender.name: Viki
lender.loan_because: I was once a single mother and know the struggles you face raising a child alone - there were people who helped me out when I most needed it and I want to repay - this is an excellent way to help someone who was in a similar situation
lender.occupational_info: I sell home decor and gift products direct to retailers

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: The results so far in alleviating poverty through microfinancing are impressive and hopeful. It's both fun and fulfilling to give through Kiva.

lender.name: Stephenkatee
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe it is a fundamental human responsibility to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Wisconsin Women's Business Initiative Corporation - helping micro businesses grow in the United States.

lender.name: Lin Sisters
lender.loan_because: Sharing our luck.
lender.occupational_info: Our parents migrated to Burma from China. We migrated to US. We worked hard and very fortunate to live a great life. In honor to our beloved late parents, we would like to share our luck with people who are willing to work hard to improve their life.

lender.name: Killerflies
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime...................enough said
lender.occupational_info: Currently researching lung disease and fly-fishing when time allows.

lender.name: KaTe
lender.loan_because: As a global citizen, I believe in helping those who want to help themselves. Kiva is a hand-up rather than a hand-out. How awesome is that?

lender.name: jodie and don
lender.loan_because: we are all connected through God

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer network engineer.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to allow people to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Elementary School in Livermore, California.

lender.loan_because: I am motivated and inspired by the recipients. I am also humbled by the work of Muhammad Yunus and KIVA.org.
lender.occupational_info: I provide commercial legal services to domestic entities and individuals.

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: It's more personal than giving to a faceless charity - I want to see the success!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the President of a company that manufactures plastic parts for boats. I sit at a desk all day and work on the computer and phone.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can. We all can and should do something!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find joy in their work and in their lives

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I feel that food production and sales are a vital part of a viable community life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with parents, staff and children in grades 6 - 8 and keep the mechanics of a middle school moving.

lender.loan_because: It reminds me that everything is given

lender.name: Nancy, Andy & kidlets
lender.loan_because: This pretty much sums it up: http://www.sheknows.com/articles/804229.htm
lender.occupational_info: N: I'm a writer and editor who started a company so I could create and share and inform and inspire... and work from home so I can be around for my four fabulous kids. :-) | A: Photographer

lender.name: Lelia
lender.occupational_info: Mi trabajo consiste en proveer ayuda y servicios en la comunidad. Fortalecemos a la familia latina y buscamos un puente entre ellos y la comunidad ya establecida de este pais.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to have direct positive impact on someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I create special programs for television about people, places and events for PBS (Public Broadcasting) in the USA

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to give.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.occupational_info: Retail Clothing Store

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: It's my small part to help others in need. I don't have millions that can make a difference to many, but with many others my small donation combined with theirs can help others. And in turn by helping others, perhaps they will spread that, pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: For my job: I help people with disabilities get to work, feel productive and give back to their families, their communities and to themselves. I have always done volunteer work and enjoy giving of myself.

lender.name: Penguin Project
lender.loan_because: we want to love, love, love

lender.name: mark
lender.occupation: life & (in) business coach plus personal trainer
lender.loan_because: sharing helps everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reach goals, make changes & solve challenges.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe in the power of small business.

lender.name: Ivy
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to do so. I am honored.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I support professionals in their careers.

lender.name: Dalila
lender.occupation: IT Industry Procurement Professional and Mom
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make this world a better place, and leave it to our children better than we found it. My country (Bosnia) was destroyed by a brutal war in the '90s. 7 members of my family were killed. We lost everything we had: people we loved and our home. People we didn't know helped us pull our life together. Now I'm just doing a little bit that I can to help someone else. I sincerely hope it gives them hope to carry on.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large computer company. I buy computer software products, which we then sell with our computers. It is great to work with people from many countries, races and religions. I'm also a mom to two little boys, who are the light of my life.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I am in the business of empowering women with information and resources to succeed. Kiva is a perfect mesh with my values!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of four children. I work from home as an editor and writer.

lender.name: Yasha
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: I build airplanes

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: My dad was a small businessman. I work for a small company. I believe in this way of sustaining economies.
lender.occupational_info: I read scripts written for television shows and films, and I write reports that help them avoid being sued for accidentally defaming a person or a business.

lender.name: Kathy & Thom
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live their dreams

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write stuff, people pay me.

lender.name: SAM
lender.loan_because: IF NOT ME, then who ? IF NOT NOW, then when ?
lender.occupational_info: I AM OWNER AND PHARMACIST OF A PHARMACY & MEDICAL EQUIPMENT BUSINESS. I AM ALSO A COUNTY COUNCILMAN. AND A MEMBER OF THE LOCAL LIONS CLUB.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs! -especially in distant places. We are all connected.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: My daughter told me about this site. I guess she thought I would enjoy it because I have a desire to help others because others have helped me. I know it only takes a small gesture from a fellow human being to change the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: I live in a small town and do several things. I have a degree in civil engineering that has opened up many doors for me. I am a retired land surveyor. A land surveyor measures the land for documentation. After retiring, I am now helping my son with his business.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to leave my daughters a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my daughters, it is a great job, I am very lucky.

lender.name: Steve of Troy
lender.loan_because: Helping people is good!

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I know that there are people out there who I may never meet, but whom I can still impact in some way. I've been very fortunate in my life, and I think that it's my duty as a citizen of this world to do something that can allow for others to develop their lives and maintain their goals as well.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: in order to help yourself, you must help others.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Because I am surrounded by a generous family and wonderful friends who have helped me throughtout my life.

lender.name: Mesky
lender.loan_because: makes me happy!!!

lender.name: Dirk & Kristen
lender.loan_because: We are inspired by the stories that we have read on Kiva. We are always happy to help hard working people who want a hand up rather than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: Own and operate a small chain of tanning salons that we started in 2002

lender.name: josh
lender.loan_because: mainly guilt: my easy lifestyle is a stark contrast to so many other people in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I invest pension fund money in commercial property

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: A small investment that can pay big dividends
lender.occupational_info: Design and build houses

lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I know how great it feels to have someone believe in you and what you're doing
lender.occupational_info: I help fit people with glasses

lender.name: Laura

lender.name: Rosa

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them have happier families and friends.

lender.name: Dan and clan
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals make the difference. We control our destiny to impact our global society, we need but choose to act.
lender.occupational_info: I work with interesting technologies that improve productivity and enhance the ability to conduct business electronically.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I was in the Peace Corps in Colombia 40 years ago and wish there had been a program like this back then.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have recieved so much. I want to give something back.
